Weather Application

latitude: {{ weatherData.results[0].latitude }}

Country: {{ weatherData.results[0].country }}

Longitude: {{ weatherData.results[0].longitude }}

Population: {{ weatherData.results[0].population }}

Windspeed:{{weatherData.weather.current_weather.windspeed}}

weathercode:{{weatherData.weather.current_weather.weathercode}}

Weather Description: {{ getWeatherDescription(weatherData.weather.current_weather.weathercode) }}
